snippet: The service said its revenues were up 4.3 percent in the quarter that ended Dec. 31 and that failure to pay into a retirement health fund led to the loss.
abstract: Postal Services reports revenue increase of 4.3 percent in quarter ending Dec 31, and $754 million net loss in same quarter.
lead_paragraph: The service said its revenues were up 4.3 percent in the quarter that ended Dec. 31 and that failure to pay into a retirement health fund led to the loss.

headline.main: Revenue Rises, but Postal Service Posts Loss
headline.print_headline: Revenue Rises, but Postal Service Posts Loss
